name: hadoop-portworx
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache HDFS Service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/hadoop-hdfs.html
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache HDFS Service is being uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
preInstallNotes:
Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.

Default configuration requires 5 agent nodes each with: CPU: 0.9 | Memory: 6144MB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Journal node: 3 instances | 0.3 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Name node: 2 instances | 0.3 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

ZKFC node: 2 instances | 0.3 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Data node: 3 instances | 0.3 CPU | 2048 MB MEM
